DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare quality care patient experience two outpatient follow-up activity : 1 ) Standard telePRO ( fix interval telePRO follow-up ) 2 ) Open Access telePRO ( patient-initiated telePRO follow-up )
DOC.brief_title: Tele-patient-reported Outcomes ( telePRO ) Clinical Practice - Effect Patient-initiated Versus Fixed Interval telePRO Based Outpatient Follow-up
DOC.criteria: Males female Age 15 year Diagnosis epilepsy Referred standard telePRO clinician Access internet ( webresponders standard telePRO ) Can speak understand Danish Paper responder Referred telePRO proxy questionnaire
